snippet: The Rangers’ goalie Henrik Lundqvist has a 9-2 record in elimination games since the start of the 2012 playoffs, and has won four of five Game 7s in his career.
abstract: New York Rangers goalie Henrik Lundqvist has a 9-2 record in elimination games since the start of the 2012 playoffs, and has won four of five Game 7s in his career; knowing their star goaltender has been through these tempests before only bolsters the Rangers outlook before facing Pittsburgh Penguins in another Game 7, their fifth in three seasons.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ goalie Henrik Lundqvist has a 9-2 record in elimination games since the start of the 2012 playoffs, and has won four of five Game 7s in his career.

headline.main: In Lundqvist, Rangers Have an Unflappable Master of the Seventh Game
headline.print_headline: In Lundqvist, Rangers Have an Unflappable Master of the Seventh Game
